name: Days Of My Life
description:
Days Of My Life is the simplest 2D adventure game in which you will have to make fateful decisions
What is human destiny? Do our actions decide much in our fate? What if I told you that life can be lived in different ways? What if you had asked that girl out on a date and your life would have been different? Well, nothing can be returned… But you can live the life of Matthew, the main character of Days Of My Life. The hero experiences loneliness from early childhood. He decides to tell his story to a psychologist . Try the fate of the Main character…
Determine the fate of the hero by making important decisions in his life.

The story tells about the attempts to understand the life of a young man named Matthew. With each step back in the conversation, a new fragment of his past is revealed.

Key Features:
1) Simple and intuitive gameplay.
2) Several different endings.
3) Nice graphics.
4) Your decisions affect the plot.
